name: Jack Black
description:
'''Thomas Jacob''' "'''Jack'''" '''Black''' (born August 28, 1969) is an American actor, comedian and musician. He is known for playing leading roles in [[Children's film|family]] and [[Comedy film|comedy films]], in addition to his voice work in [[Animation|animated features]]. His accolades include an [[Children's and Family Emmy Awards|Emmy Award]], a [[Grammy Awards|Grammy Award]], and nominations for two [[Critics' Choice Movie Awards|Critics' Choice Awards]] and three [[Golden Globe Awards]]. In 2018, he was awarded a star on the [[Hollywood Walk of Fame]].

Black began acting at the age of 13, and his early films include ''[[Dead Man Walking (film)|Dead Man Walking]]'' (1995), ''[[The Cable Guy]]'' (1996), ''[[Mars Attacks!]]'' (1996) and ''[[Enemy of the State (film)|Enemy of the State]]'' (1998). He gained recognition for starring in the romantic comedy ''[[High Fidelity (film)|High Fidelity]]'' (2000), which led to substantial roles in films like ''[[Shallow Hal]]'' (2001) and ''[[Orange County (film)|Orange County]]'' (2002). He established himself as a leading man with a starring role in the musical comedy ''[[School of Rock]]'' (2003), earning a nomination for the [[Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in a Motion Picture â€“ Musical or Comedy|Golden Globe for Best Actor]]. He then starred in the films ''[[King Kong (2005 film)|King Kong]]'' (2005), ''[[The Holiday (2006 film)|The Holiday]]'' (2006), ''[[Nacho Libre]]'' (2006) and ''[[Tropic Thunder]]'' (2008). Also in 2008, he began voicing [[Po (Kung Fu Panda)|Po]] in the ''[[Kung Fu Panda]]'' franchise.

Black was critically praised for portraying [[Bernie Tiede]] in the biographical thriller film ''[[Bernie (2011 film)|Bernie]]'' (2011), receiving several Best Actor award nominations. Following career fluctuations, he experienced a resurgence with roles in ''[[Goosebumps (film)|Goosebumps]]'' (2016), ''[[Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle]]'' (2017), ''[[The House with a Clock in Its Walls (film)|The House with a Clock in Its Walls]]'' (2018), ''[[Jumanji: The Next Level]]'' (2019) and ''[[A Minecraft Movie]]'' (2025). He also voiced [[Bowser]] in ''[[The Super Mario Bros. Movie]]'' (2023), receiving a nomination for the [[Golden Globe Award for Best Original Song|Golden Globe for Best Original Song]].

Outside of acting, Black formed the comedy musical duo [[Tenacious D]] with long-time friend [[Kyle Gass]] in 1994; they have won one [[Grammy Award for Best Metal Performance|Grammy for Best Metal Performance]]. Since 2018, he has run a YouTube channel called Jablinski Games since.
